TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileWebRequest extends System.Net.WebRequest implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class FileWebRequest Inherits WebRequest Implements ISerializable
type FileWebRequest = class inherit WebRequest interface ISerializable

summary.span: 提供 類別的檔案系統實作。

span.span: Provides a file system implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作`abstract`統一資源識別元 (Uri)，使用基底類別`file://`配置要求的本機檔案。The class implements the `abstract` base class for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that use the `file://` scheme to request local files. 請勿使用建構函式。Do not use the constructor. 使用方法來初始化的新執行個體類別。Use the method to initialize new instances of the class. 如果 URI 配置`file://`，則方法會傳回物件。If the URI scheme is `file://`, the method returns a object. 方法提出同步要求中指定的檔案屬性，並傳回包含回應的物件。The method makes a synchronous request for the file specified in the property and returns a object that contains the response. 您可以進行檔案使用的非同步要求和方法。You can make an asynchronous request for the file using the and methods. 當您想要將資料寫入至檔案，方法會傳回来寫入的執行個體。When you want to write data to a file, the method returns a instance to write to. 和方法提供寫入資料流的非同步存取。The and methods provide asynchronous access to the write data stream. 類別會倚賴錯誤處理和程式碼存取安全性的類別。The class relies on the class for error handling and code access security. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來存取檔案系統資源。The following code example uses the class to access a file system resource. [!code-cpp[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/CPP/getrequeststream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/CS/getrequeststream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/VB/getrequeststream.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消對網際網路資源的要求。

span.span: Cancels a request to an Internet resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取消資源的要求。The method cancels a request to a resource. 取消要求之後，呼叫， ， ， ， ，或方法會使具有屬性設為。After a request is canceled, calling the , , , , , or method causes a with the property set to . **請注意**應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。**Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動用來將資料傳送至檔案系統資源資料流的非同步要求。The method starts an asynchronous request for a stream used to send data to a file system resource. 回呼方法可實作委派會使用方法，以傳回要求資料流。The callback method that implements the delegate uses the method to return the request stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用，讓非同步要求的物件。The following code example uses to make an asynchronous request for a object. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別不會驗證檔案從本機檔案系統的要求，它會忽略內容，如果有的話的屬性。Because the class does not authenticate requests for files from the local file system, it ignores the contents, if any, of the property. 驗證由基礎檔案系統中的檔案資源的存取控制清單。Authentication for is handled by the access control lists for the file resource in the underlying file system.

summary.span: 結束應用程式用來寫入資料之 執行個體的非同步要求。

returns.span: 物件，由應用程式用來寫入資料。

span.span: A object that the application uses to write data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會完成所啟動的非同步資料流要求方法。The method completes an asynchronous stream request that was started by the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免記憶體回收的時間問題，請務必關閉回應資料流，藉由呼叫方法所傳回的資料流方法之後呼叫方法。To avoid timing issues with garbage collection, be sure to close the response stream by calling the method on the stream returned by the method after calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法以結束非同步要求物件。The following example uses the method to end the asynchronous request for a object. summary.span: 取得或設定要求逾時之前的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time until the request times out.

value.span: 時間 (以毫秒為單位，直到要求逾時為止)，或值 (指出要求未逾時)。

span.span: The time, in milliseconds, until the request times out, or the value to indicate that the request does not time out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網域名稱系統 (DNS) 查詢可能需要最多 15 秒鐘傳回或逾時。如果您的要求包含需要解析的主機名稱，而且您設定的值小於 15 秒，可能需要 15 秒以上之前就會擲回以指出您的要求逾時。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將屬性。The following code example sets the property. 中的完整範例，請參閱類別。Refer to the complete example in the class.
